name: Space Station Challenge
description:
Enjoy the thrill of docking with the international space station and then performing five specific EVA (extra vehicular activity) missions.

Use the dual joystick interface to modify the orientation of the vehicle with one control, while using the other to carefully move closer to the space station dock.

Use similar controls to control the jetpack on your space suit during EVA.

Ground control vocally guides you through the various maneuvers, as needed.

Optionally shares your accomplishments with Facebook, Twitter, Weibo, email, or instant messaging (iOS 6+).

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, iPhone X and XS displays.
